name: Ext_R5_EvidenceVariable_ch_definitionReference
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.EvidenceVariable.characteristic.definitionReference for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents EvidenceVariable.characteristic.definitionReference from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/EvidenceVariable|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Defines the characteristic (without using type and value) by a Reference
element.definition: Defines the characteristic using a Reference.
element.comment: `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.definition[x]` maps to R4 `EvidenceVariable.characteristic.definition[x]`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/EvidenceVariable)` has no mapping Type `canonical(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Resource)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: Defines the characteristic (without using type and value) by a Reference
